memory.product: Admind — AI-powered disability insurance report writer for psychiatrists in Switzerland
memory.stage: Customer discovery with 5-10 psychiatrists in Geneva as beta design partners
memory.target_users: Psychiatrists in Geneva writing psychiatric AI (Assurance Invalidité) reports

key_domain_terms.rapports_AI: Disability insurance reports for Assurance Invalidité
key_domain_terms.Foerster_criteria: Federal Tribunal case law criteria for psychiatric disability assessments
key_domain_terms.structured_assessment_indicators: Standardized framework for evaluating disability claims
key_domain_terms.cantonal_AI_offices: Regional disability insurance offices that issue standardized forms

memory.vision: Platform for compliant medico-legal documentation across report types, specialties, and European markets
